relnotes.name: Open Environment Core
relnotes.purpose: Open Environment is to provide an API layer above the Symbian OS native API that is more aligned with the APIs in Linux and Windows, more familiar to developers with a background on RTOS, Linux or Windows, and generally simpler and more coarse-grained than the native API
relnotes.defect: Rectified the header classifications wherever necessary, either including it in .cpp or promoting it
added dosc files, changes from iSource and defect fixes

defect.title: Add _UHEAP_MARK for tests code to catch Memory leakages
